yaml.image-alt: Halina is smiling and positioned to the right with a epic mountain and meadow landscape behind her. She is wearing a backpack, a blue bandana around her neck, a green flannel over a tan t-shirt, and blue shorts with sunglasses perched on top of her head.

markdown.markdown:
----

My name is Halina Do-Linh (she/her/hers) I am an environmental data scientist who cares about urban environmental systems and the people within them. Usually you can find me in the mountains, but these days I'm closer to the beach working on data science curricula for the [Learning Hub](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/learning-hub) at the [National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis (NCEAS)](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/).

Click around and I look forward to connecting with you.

metadata.image-alt: Halina is smiling and positioned to the right with a epic mountain and meadow landscape behind her. She is wearing a backpack, a blue bandana around her neck, a green flannel over a tan t-shirt, and blue shorts with sunglasses perched on top of her head.
